name: 5th Annual Formulation & Drug Delivery Congress
content: Over 50 presentations and case studies focused on the key issues in large molecule and small molecule drug formulation and drug delivery Including 5 interactive streams: Large Molecule Drug Formulation Advances in Drug Delivery New to 2019! Continuous Manufacturing & Processing for Improved Efficiency Small Molecule Drug Formulation Bioanalysis and Stabilisation With New Featured Streams: New to 2019! Formulation & Delivery for RNA Therapies New to 2019! Nanoparticle-medicated Formulation & Delivery
